conversation.text: For those who enjoy a thrilling story with strong characters, I would recommend 'When a Stranger Calls' (2006). The film features a young babysitter who becomes the target of an increasingly menacing prank caller. The acting by Colleen Dewhurst and Tessa Thompson is memorable.
